oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relay-free second order sliding mode control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JANARDHANAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper presents an approach for achieving second order sliding mode in continuous-time systems. The existing methods of second order sliding mode control are based on relay control in the derivative of the input. Such a control, though continuous, is not smooth in close proximity of the sliding surface. The proposed control algorithm achieves second order sliding mode by using a smooth control signal which avoids the use of a relay in the control.
